mapper.select: SELECT id,trade_value value from dictionary_trade_types ORDER BY id
SELECT name from pay_channels where id=#{pcid}
SELECT id from agents where code like '${code}%'
SELECT code from agents where id=#{agentId}
SELECT company_name from agents where id=#{agentid}
SELECT current_agent_id cid,top_agent_id tid,profits_get,profits_pay from profits where trade_record_id =#{id}
